website_summaries.verdict: The Adidas Superstar is absolutely an iconic classic loved by many sneaker fans and casual consumers of all ages. It is well-loved for its timeless design that basically goes well with any outfit, not to mention its comfort and affordable price.Overall, the majority are satisfied with this classic. But some note that its quality seems to have declined over the years.
pros: The majority of the reviewers like that the Adidas Superstar is an iconic and classic shoe that never goes out of style
The greater number of reviewers commend this shoe for being extremely comfortable when worn
Some claim that the Adidas Superstar shoes are durable
The affordable price tag of this shoe is a huge plus for numerous purchasers
A few buyers are pleased that this shoe looks exactly as it is advertised in the photos
Some wearers are satisfied with the arch support that this shoe provides
Some reviewers comment that this is one of the best pairs they’ve bought in a long time
Several users note that they get lots of compliments whenever they wear this shoe
A number of purchasers like that there is plenty of room in this shoe’s toe box
cons: Some are not pleased with the minor design tweaks on the reissue version, like the gold “Superstar” branding and the thinner shoelaces
A few buyers remark that this shoe is stiff at first, but setting the shoelaces a bit loose will do the trick

customer_reviews.title: not happy at all with the trainers as we paid good ...
customer_reviews.text: Within the household we have quite a number of pairs of Adidas superstars and this pair is quite different, to me they don't seem to be genuine, we purchased these trainers on September 4th and all that they have been is trouble, first all the writing inside the trainer came away, and now all the leather running along side the lace holes is coming off, not happy at all with the trainers as we paid good money for them👎
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes but a tad on the larger side
customer_reviews.text: Id wanted superstars for a long time, these shoes arrived promptly and well packaged. They are clearly genuine adidas and have beat a lot of other high street prices so would recommend buying from here. To me they fit well but perhaps a tad on the large side, so keep this in mind whilst ordering. Would recommend though :) (if this review was helpful, give it a thumbs up!)
customer_reviews.author: Jado Pado

customer_reviews.title: Arrives without genuine box of adidas
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the box it was delivered on considering how much we paid i'd expect them to arrive in a nadidas box and wrapped carefully instead of a plan box which had the shoes loose inside - very upset as this is a birthday present snd looks second hand!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. (*not great)
customer_reviews.text: * Update. After 3 months light use they’ve started to fall apart. I only wear them socialising and for light use so they should last longer. The last pair I had lasted 3 years before replacing them. Not great.* I bought these as a replacement for my old pair which had been through the wars a bit. Look great and fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: D.C

customer_reviews.title: Not fake!
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine through and I love them! Checked the Barcode, and other dead give always and they are real Superstars. If you wanna check yours, use a barcode scanner or look up usual fakes and compare. As for the shoes, 10/10 the padding inside is loose but you can find replacements for them if they ever get runnier and for me the fact they're replaceable is good as it's usually the inside of the shoe that get damaged before the outside. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Cheeki B

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVVVVVVVEEE QUALITY 💙💙💙💙💙
customer_reviews.text: I don't want to say how good these are bcos youll sell out lol😆BUT I ABSOLUTELY ADORE THESE VALUE QUALITY I GOT FOR £39.99 INSTEAD of usual £70 whoooohoooo buzzing i blummin love amazon go deep dont buy off 1st page search these babies out 💙
customer_reviews.author: Scarllette Tyler

customer_reviews.title: proper adidas trainers, not boys only, they are ...
customer_reviews.text: proper adidas trainers, not boys only, they are unisex. don't pay more for the ones that say unisex. definitely the same as the more expensive one advertised on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Big

customer_reviews.title: Damaged box , fake goods
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a Father’s Day gift, the box arrived damaged which was very disappointing. My husband has had several pairs of these trainers over the years and in his opinion these are “probably fake”. That would explain the low price as these average around £80 and I paid £50. The material does not feel right and there are tiny details not quite right according to my husband. I thought I had found a bargain but turns out they are just knock offs!
customer_reviews.author: K. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Great trainers.Had these 8 months now and are very durable and comfortable.I don't really look after them (just wipe em clean every now and then ) . I slip them on rather than untying them and are showing no real signs of wear . Sizing is quite generous for Adidas(I'm usually a 12 in Adidas and some are narrow but I got the 11.5 and they're just right (length and width) ...100c/o recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pair !
customer_reviews.text: Great pair. I purchased these for my teenage son and as directed it had to be this specific kind. They must be " the in thing " amongst teenagers 😀. He has been wearing them for about a year and they're still going strong. Would definately recommend.

product_meta.title: adidas Originals Unisex Adults’ Superstar Trainers
product_meta.description: This sophisticated shoe dresses an iconic '70s basketball style in stealth triple-black leather. Featuring a full grain leather upper, the authentic adidas Superstar shell toe, and a herringbone-pattern outsole.
